entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change default behavior for the commands that require nuget.org #44312
  • Add a optional reason for the requires msbuild theory/fact attribute #44311
  • Allow running published apps using `dotnet run` #44307
  • Can't make a C++ app with C++/CLI dependency self contained #44305
  • Extended-length paths using prefix "\\?\" do not allow slash characters #44303

Closed

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43848
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43853
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43847

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix installing dependencies in vmr-build.yml #44314
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire fixes #44313
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use restore action config options #44309
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Enable signing on all except pgo #44306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Sync analyzer rules with ASP.NET Core, fix issues and update code to newer C# #44304
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-VMR
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2564066 #44252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable is shipping package in the installer redist to stabilize branding of the installers #44289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Install dependencies on macOS #44294
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Containers] Fix insecure registry handling to use the correct port for the HTTP protocol #44235
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Continue printing out redirected process output after we detect browser launch URL. #44290
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove manual home variable lookup #44266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Generate VSMSBuildExtension package in join point #44288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #44203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    Area-Tools, 9.0.2xx
  • Dotnet test integration #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Javiercn/replace swa globbing #44159
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
